posts.post_content:

Only issue with the card is the chipping on the right border of the card, there are no creases,wrinkling or paperloss - very nice card for the grade OR WILL TRADE UP OR DOWN FOR COBB RED PORTRAIT,BAT OFF, OR ANY MATTY's (Matty's do not have to be 206's) PSA/SGC GRADED Thanks Doug
